parameter.name: shipmentId
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Shipment details for a specific shipmentId.

parameter.name: systemMessageRemoteId
parameter.description: The System Message Remote ID to send Shipment Receipt Feed.

parameter.name: systemMessageTypeId
parameter.description: The System Message Type ID for generating Shipment Receipt Feed.

parameter.name: sinceReceivedDate
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Shipment Receipt details received after a specific date.

parameter.name: shipmentTypeId
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Shipment Receipt details for a specific Shipment Type ID.

parameter.name: shipmentStatusId
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Shipment Receipt details for a specific Status ID.

parameter.name: productStoreIds
parameter.description: List of product Store Ids for generating Shipment Receipt feed. For passing the Product Store Ids as list, add values like - SM_STORE,SG_STORE and for single value use - SM_STORE.

log.message: Generating Shipments Receipt Feed file for Shipment ${shipmentId} at time ${nowDate}

Could not find SystemMessageType with ID ${systemMessageTypeId}
